posts.post_content:
Underwhelming, but still not terrible.  
  
Too expensive for any serious format, which is often the drawback of sticking a nice ability on a needlessly large creature. Still, considering how many utterly horrible red creatures have appeared over the years at around 5 casting cost, this thing isn't bad.
